name: Article Scraper
description: Extracts article text, authors, images, and metadata from a given URL or raw HTML using newspaper3k
author: Shinkai

default_language.description: The default language to assume for articles

url.description: Valid URL of the article to extract content from. Must be accessible and contain article content

html.description: Raw HTML content of the article page. If provided, overrides URL fetching. Must be valid HTML

language.description: Two-letter language code (e.g., 'en', 'zh') for article parsing. Overrides default_language setting
